original_text: Thus all the work that Solomon did for the house of the Lord was finished. And Solomon brought in the things that David his father had dedicated, and stored the silver, the gold, and all the vessels in the treasuries of the house of God.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 여호와의 전을 위하여 만드는 모든 일을 마친지라 이에 솔로몬이 그의 아버지 다윗이 드린 은과 금과 모든 기구를 가져다가 하나님의 전 곳간에 두었더라

sentences.original_text: Thus all the work that Solomon did for the house of the Lord was finished.
sentences.korean_translation: 이와 같이 솔로몬이 여호와의 집을 위해 행한 모든 역사가 마쳐지니라

sentences.original_text: And Solomon brought in the things
that David his father had dedicated,
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지 다윗이 구별하여 드린 것들이라

sentences.original_text: and stored the silver, the gold, and all the vessels
in the treasuries of the house of God.
